name: HoverWars
description:
Still in a very early stage of development.

No main menu yet. Maybe the sounds wont work properly. Depends on your sound card. I haven't figured out yet how to solve this issue.

I'm learning C sharp coding and Unity3D. Its my first real attempt.

https://youtu.be/XaJAM5Xb15E

(inspired by Total Annihilation, Command and Conquer and some open world games)
